amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to carry out the diversity visa program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 27 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds to carry out the diversity visa program.

action.text: Amendment (A023) offered by Ms. Herseth Sandlin.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Herseth Sandlin amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
